pm.test("Error handling: status code is 404", function () {

request.description:
Returns the number of created and updated users.
This resource does not support bulk delete.
Clear Values with BW_NULL:
  • first_name, last_name, and email can never be `BW_NULL`
  • preferred_name can be `BW_NULL` but the user will fall back to first_name when preferred_name is absent
  • manager_id or manager_email can be `BW_NULL` and will cause both values to be cleared out and removed from the pending user (matches preexisting logic for passing empty string for both of these fields)
  • employee_id can be `BW_NULL` on create but NOT on update (matches preexisting logic for empty string handling)
  • locale can be `BW_NULL` and will clear the record entry but the user will fall back to the org locale if the user locale is empty (matches preexisting logic for empty string handling)
  • If `BW_NULL` is provided for is_active then the field value will default to True
  • If `BW_NULL` is provided for terminated then terminated will default to False, resulting in is_active defaulting to True
  • If `BW_NULL` is provided for deactivation_date then deactivation_date will return True, resulting in is_active being True
